import React,{useState}from"react";import"./App.css";import Alert from"./components/Alert";import Navbar from"./components/Navbar";import TextForm from"./components/TextForm";import About from"./components/About";import{BrowserRouter as Router,Routes,Route}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[mode,setMode]=useState("light");// Whether dark mode is enabled or not
